tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Discontinuance/Whether service of Statement of Claim out of time and without leave of court invalid/Whether action deemed discontinued/Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 1997 Rev Ed) O 21 r 2(6)

Civil Procedure/Extension of time/Statement of Claim served outside prescribed period and without leave of court/Whether court should extend time for service of Statement of Claim/Rules of Court (Cap 322, R 5, 1997 Rev Ed) O 3 r 4

Civil Procedure/Rules of court/Non-compliance/Whether service out of time and without leave an irregularity capable of being cured especially if prejudice to defendants can be compensated by costs/Rules of Court (Cap 322, R5, 1997 Rev Ed) O 2 r 1
